name: ZTE Europe
goal: ZTE Corporation is a globally-leading provider of telecommunications equipment and network solutions. With operations in 160 countries, the company is a leader in technology innovation, delivering superior products and business solutions to clients all over the world. Founded in 1985, ZTE is listed on both the Hong Kong and Shenzhen Stock Exchanges and is China’s largest listed telecoms equipment company.
interests: Competition, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: ZTE operates in 20 countries of the European Union and is committed to doing more in terms of high-quality products and services delivery.
